data.name: NotLoggedIn.Text
data.value: Please login to post a reply

data.name: [RESX:NotAuthorized].Text
data.value: You must be logged in to post a reply.

data.name: Subscribe.Text
data.value: Email me when someone replies to this thread.

data.name: ForumSubscribe.Text
data.value: Email me when someone posts to this forum.

data.name: DeleteConfirm.Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this item?

data.name: NoProfile.Text
data.value: User has not created a profile.

data.name: SendEmail.NotLoggedIn.Text
data.value: You must be a registered user and logged in to send email.

data.name: [RESX:ConfirmCancel].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to cancel?

data.name: [RESX:ForumSubscribe:FALSE].Text
data.value: Click to subscribe to this forum.

data.name: [RESX:ForumSubscribe:TRUE].Text
data.value: You are subscribed to this forum. Click to unsubscribe.

data.name: [RESX:TopicSubscribe:FALSE].Text
data.value: Check this box to subscribe to this topic.

data.name: [RESX:TopicSubscribe:TRUE].Text
data.value: You are subscribed to this topic.

data.name: [RESX:Attachments:Confirm:Remove].Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove this attachment?

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:Delete].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this item?

data.name: [RESX:Locked:Note].Text
data.value: Check the box to lock this topic.

data.name: [RESX:Pinned:Note].Text
data.value: Check the box to pin this topic. Pinned topics will appear before all others.

data.name: [RESX:Subscribe:Note].Text
data.value: Check the box to receive email notifications for this topic.

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:Lock].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to Lock this topic?

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:Pin].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to Pin this topic?

data.name: [RESX:PostIcons:Note].Text
data.value: Select a post icon to help classify your topic.

data.name: [RESX:Tags:Note].Text
data.value: A tag is a keyword or term associated with the content you are submitting.

data.name: [RESX:Poll:Note].Text
data.value: Create a poll by entering a short question followed by 2 or more answers. Enter one answer per line in the text box below.

data.name: [RESX:ERROR:Search].Text
data.value: The search process has encountered an error. Please contact the site administrator.

data.name: [RESX:SearchNoResults].Text
data.value: No results were found using the criteria you provided.

data.name: [RESX:Approved:Note].Text
data.value: Check the box to approve this post.

data.name: [RESX:EmailMessageDefault].Text
data.value:
I thought you might be interested in reading this web page: [TOPICLINK]
From, [DISPLAYNAME]

data.name: [RESX:Error:FloodControl].Text
data.value: You must wait at least {0} seconds between posts

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:UnLock].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to un-lock this topic?

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:UnPin].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to un-pin this topic?

data.name: [RESX:Error:FileTooLarge].Text
data.value: The maximum file size allowed is {0} kb.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EnablePrivateMessaging].Text
data.value: Choose to enable private messaging and the appropriate private messaging module you have installed.

data.name: [RESX:PrefBlockAvatars].Help
data.value: Select this option if you do not wish to view the avatars of other members.

data.name: [RESX:PrefBlockSignatures].Help
data.value: Select this option if you do not wish to view the signatures of other members.

data.name: [RESX:PrefDefaultSort].Help
data.value: Specify the order in which you would like items displayed.

data.name: [RESX:PrefJumpToLastPost].Help
data.value: You will always be directed to the last reply you read for the topic you are choosing to view.

data.name: [RESX:PrefPageSize].Help
data.value: Choose the number of items you would like displayed at a time.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:PrefShowReplies].Text
data.value: Selecting this option will allow you to see all the replies for a given topic while you are composing a reply.

data.name: [RESX:PrefTopicSubscribeType].Help
data.value: The forum admin may have allowed you to choose different forms of subscriptions. You can select your desired preference.

data.name: [RESX:PrefTopicSubscribe].Help
data.value: This will be your default setting when you are creating a topic or adding a reply. This does not affect forum level subscriptions.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:PrefUseAjax].Text
data.value: AJAX is programming method to improve the way you interact with the forums. You can choose whether or not you wish to use this capability.

data.name: [RESX:Message:EditIntervalReached].Text
data.value: This forum only allows you to edit your post within {0} minutes from the time you created your post.

data.name: [RESX:NotAuthorizedReply].Text
data.value: You are not authorized to post a reply.

data.name: [RESX:NotAuthorizedTopic].Text
data.value: You are not authorized to create a new topic

data.name: [RESX:AddToFavorites].Text
data.value: Add this to your browser favorites

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:Reject].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to reject this message?

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ProfileVisibility].Text
data.value: Select what type of users should have access to view other profiles.

data.name: AlertSubject.Text
data.value: A post by [DisplayName] has been flagged for review by [FlaggedBy]

data.name: [RESX:Signature].Help
data.value: Please enter a signature that you would like added included with your posts.

data.name: [RESX:SearchInputError].Text
data.value: Please enter a keyword, username or tag.
